content: if you want to surprise a loved one with a shawl then this **sweetheart shawl** 1 is just perfect it s crocheted in the variegated dream color yarn and the edge is decorated with small hearts it doesn t get much cuter **skill level ** intermediate **crochet hook ** g/6 4 mm **yarn ** dream colour unicorn 09 - 3 nøgler **abbrevations ** st - stitch chain - chain double_crochet - double_crochet single_crochet - single_crochet treble_crochet - treble t-chain - turning chain 3-double_crochet-puff st take yarn around hook and insert hook in the st pull yarn through the st yarn around the hook and pull yarn through the two loops on the hook 3 times in same st yo and pull yarn through all 4 loops on the hook **heart ** chain 5 slip_stitch in 5th chain from the hook turn round 1 chain 3 2 treble_crochet 3 double_crochet chain 1 1 treble_crochet chain 1 3 double_crochet 2 treble_crochet chain 3 slip_stitch around the ring 1 https //hobbii com/sweetheart-shawl utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=pattern&utm_content=sweetheart-shawl+hbtrack&utm_term=swr
